definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Neither magnesium nor boron brought particularly many electrons to MgB2.
sentences.chinese: 在硼化镁中，镁跟硼都没有提供特别多电子。

sentences.english: Neither magnesium nor boron brought particularly many electrons to MgB2.
sentences.chinese: 在硼化镁中，镁跟硼都没有提供特别多电子。

sentences.english: The pilot-scale test results of producing Boric acid and manganese carbonate from B-Mn ore are elucidated.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了由硼锰矿生产硼酸和碳酸锰的半工业试验结果。

sentences.english: The radiation was filtered either by borosilicate glass or by quartz .
sentences.chinese: 辐射光源或用硼硅酸盐玻璃或用石英过滤。

sentences.english: The influences of the agglomerated boron to the processing of boron-based fuel-rich propellants were studied.
sentences.chinese: 详细研究聚团硼对含硼富燃推进剂工艺的影响。

sentences.english: The structure and properties of the RE-borovanadizing steels were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了稀土加入量对钢硼钒共渗组织和性能的影响。

sentences.english: The Zeeman splitting of the excited state for B in Si was observed.
sentences.chinese: 观察到硅中硼受主激发态的塞曼分裂与移动。

sentences.english: The basic principle and specific process of eutectic melting boriding in salt bath are investigated initially in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对盐溶共晶化渗硼的基本原理和具体工艺进行了探讨。

sentences.english: It was mainly determined by the amount of dry matter in tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 烟株硼积累量主要取决于干物质积累量。

sentences.english: Arsenic has a diffusion coefficient an order of magnitude lower than that of boron and phosphorous.
sentences.chinese: 砷的扩散系数比硼和磷低一个数量级。

sentences.english: The borosilicate glass was strengthened by using low temperature ion exchange method.
sentences.chinese: 采用低温型离子交换法对硼硅酸盐玻璃进行增强。

sentences.english: It is very stable, particularly in glazes with a low lead and boron content.
sentences.chinese: 它的稳定性特佳，特别用在含低铅及硼的釉料中。

sentences.english: The control rods are made of boron which absorbs neutrons.
sentences.chinese: 控制棒是由能够吸收中子的硼元素制成。

sentences.english: In the past research, boron is mainly used to improve the hardenability.
sentences.chinese: 在以往的研究中，硼主要用来提高钢的淬透性能。

sentences.english: I could make this out of borosilicate glass.
sentences.chinese: 我可以用硼硅玻璃来做。

sentences.english: He said there should be an element under boron.
sentences.chinese: 他认为在，硼的下面也有个元素。
